# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_SEARCHLIGHT

## Summary
Turn on/off a vehicle search light

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle:
Goes into Water 2.
Time of Day is morning (not night) 3.
We are in interior scene 4.
If Target is above us 5.
If no Driver is there or if driver is dead
* **BOOL** on
* **BOOL** alwaysOn = false: Will guarantee that headlight will not turn off UNLESS THE FOLLOWING OCCURS:

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Only works during nighttime.
